concept.title: Help and Support
concept.shortdesc: Tap the menu icon to display the Help and Support screen.

conbody.p: From here you can navigate to online help documentation, view logs, or send logs to Support. To send logs, tap Report a Problem and select your default email application. This will pre-populate the email with the support contact email to HCL (heyhcl@pnp-hcl.com) and a subject line that will route the logs to HCL support.
